definition: to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity
series of calamities/disaster following on disaster

sentences.english: Ground collapse is a common geological hazard in shallow buried karst area.
sentences.chinese: 地面塌陷是浅埋岩溶区常见的一种地质灾害。

sentences.english: Flood and drought are the predominant natural disasters in Hunan Province.
sentences.chinese: 水旱灾害是湖南省最严重的自然灾害。

sentences.english: Flood and drought are the predominant natural disasters in Hunan Province.
sentences.chinese: 水旱灾害是湖南省最严重的自然灾害。

sentences.english: The summer rainstorm was also one of the meteorological disasters which reduce the production of large cherry.
sentences.chinese: 夏季暴雨也是影响大樱桃生产的气象灾害之一。

sentences.english: Loess landslide is the most catastrophic geohazard in the northwest area of China.
sentences.chinese: 黄土滑坡是西北地区最为严重的地质灾害。

sentences.english: The region is seriously influenced by natural diease.
sentences.chinese: 这个地区遭受了严重的自然灾害。

sentences.english: Underground engineering is frequently threatened by ground water irruption.
sentences.chinese: 地下工程常常面临突水灾害的威胁。

sentences.english: Fixed Plague Javelin to do initial weapon damage.
sentences.chinese: 确实用缩写名签武器损坏固定的灾害标枪。

sentences.english: Dangerous rock is a main geological hazard in the reservoir area of the Three Gorges Project, especially in Wanzhou area.
sentences.chinese: 三峡库区危岩灾害极其发育，万州地区具有代表性。

sentences.english: China is among the countries that have most serious geological disasters .
sentences.chinese: 中国是世界上地质灾害最严重的国家之一。

sentences.english: Houses, properties got damaged and many people found cattle dead after their disaster.
sentences.chinese: 灾害后，房屋被毁坏，耕牛死亡。
巨灾即大规模的自然灾害。

sentences.english: Collapse of mined-out area in coal mines is the chief geologic disaster in Shanxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 煤矿采空塌陷是山西省地质灾害的主要灾种。

sentences.english: Collapse of stope roof, is one of disasters occuring at underground mines.
sentences.chinese: 矿山采场顶板冒落是地下矿山开采中常见的灾害。

sentences.english: Is it a natural disaster, or negligence by our officials?
sentences.chinese: 这是自然灾害，还是我们官员的失职？

sentences.english: In this study, flood and drought losses of the system.
sentences.chinese: 本研究对水旱灾害损失进行了系统的研究。

definition: disaster-stricken/to be hit by a natural calamity
insect damage/destruction of crops by pest insects
